61378.「ここ ガートラント城駅の 駅長は\n 機械いじりが お好きな方で\n いつも:
The train station manager here at Gartlant Castle Station is a man who loves to tinker with machines and was always improving the
trains. I heard that he has stopped working as the train station manager and is now working at the castle, but I still miss him.
